text: "She Feels Like a Brand New Man Tonight" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Aaron Tippin. It was released in February 1995 as the second single from the album Lookin' Back at Myself. The song reached No. 39 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Tippin and Michael P. Heeney. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1995) !Peak position |- |- |Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|34 |} ==References== Category:1995 singles Category:1994 songs Category:Aaron Tippin songs Category:Songs written by Michael P. title: She Feels Like a Brand New Man Tonight
